250m Special Collimator/Sight for the Ju 87 Stuka G-1 and G-2.
The sight was made to help you to destroy Ivan's tanks. Based on my experience, it is much more useful than the Revi 16 for this specific task. I've destroyed around 3000 ground targets in SB, and around 1500 with Ju 87 G-1 and G-2. I made this sight after destroying 1300 tanks, and the last 200 were much easier to aim with this collimator.

How to use
It's adjusted at 250m, so you must adjust your Guns targeting distance (m) at 250m.
The horizontal red line shows the height of the shot's trajectory, also it helps you to be aligned

Jagdpanther interactive sight for Simulator battles, based on mechanical cam profile

Another experiment of mine incorporating some mechanical engineering stuff in it.

Sight is supposed to counter the unwanted parallax effect because of gun barrel and optic sight offset.

Sight distance control must be used with this sight!

Cam profile based splines rotate when adjusting range using sight distance control. There are two (three) cam profile splines in this custom sight. One for aiming point adjustment (countering parallax), another (two) is for rangefinding. Both depend on sight distance cont

Diagonal line countering parallax. RB compatible


  • Includes default ballistic block (up to 4000 m);
  • Includes diagonal line in accordance to offset of optics to the gun barrel;
  • Includes vertical range notches for use with diagonal line and sight distance control;
  • Includes static rangefinder (from 250 m to 2500 m);

Suitable for both DM12 (HEATFS) and DM13 (APFSDS) shells.

Has all the standard stuff you'd expect from my sights, ranges for each shell type, and a stadiametric rangefinder.
